statements: DELETE FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE location = 'Forest' AND species = 'Tiger';
DELETE FROM wildlife_population WHERE id = 1 AND species = 'Elephant';
DELETE FROM human_activities WHERE location = 'Forest' AND activity_type = 'Logging';
DELETE FROM human_activities WHERE impact_level > 5 AND location = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM ecosystem_health WHERE pollution_level < 3 OR biodiversity_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM human_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Logging' AND impact_on_population = 'High';
DELETE FROM observation_logs WHERE location_name = 'Forest Reserve';
